OrgName.entry: DON VALLEY STADIUM ATHLETICS AND RUNNING

Desc.entry: Stadium with floodlit 400m athletics track and 60m indoor training track available for hire and casual or coached sessions. Stages major athletics sporting events. Has coaching for children aged 5-7 years (Fundamentals multi-event group), for children aged 8-11 years (Junior Academy multi-event group) and for young people aged 12 years and over (Senior Academy multi events and separate discipline groups). Senior Academy is free to young people aged 16 years and over as part of Fitness Unlimited membership. Kids Fitness sessions for children aged 12-15 years (membership only, must be accompanied by an adult). Gymnastic coaching for children aged 3 years and over (waiting list in operation). Fitness facility available on pay as you go basis or free with Fitness Unlimited membership. Also have coached facilities for young people with disabilities (Top Club) please contact for more details.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8am-9pm, Sat & Sun 9am-5pm (opening times), please see website for details of sessions
